org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.populators

Interface IceSpike.Builder

  • Enclosing interface:
    IceSpike

    public static interface IceSpike.Builder
    A builder for constructing IceSpike populators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IceSpike build()
      Builds a new instance of a IceSpike populator with the settings set within the builder.
      IceSpike.Builder extremeSpikeBaseIncrease(int increase)
      Sets the base height increase of the extreme spikes.
      IceSpike.Builder extremeSpikeChance(int chance)
      Gets the chance of the spike much larger than normal.
      IceSpike.Builder extremeSpikeIncreaseVariance(int variance)
      Sets the variance in the height increase of extreme spikes.
      IceSpike.Builder height(int height)
      Sets the base height of the spike.
      IceSpike.Builder heightVariance(int variance)
      Sets the height variance of the spike.
      IceSpike.Builder reset()
      Resets this builder to the default values.

    • Method Detail

      • height

        IceSpike.Builder height(int height)
        Sets the base height of the spike.
        Parameters:
        height - The new base height
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • heightVariance

        IceSpike.Builder heightVariance(int variance)
        Sets the height variance of the spike. The final height will be the base height plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        variance - The new height variance
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • extremeSpikeChance

        IceSpike.Builder extremeSpikeChance(int chance)
        Gets the chance of the spike much larger than normal. The default value is 60 (therefore equating to a 1 in 60 chance).
        Parameters:
        chance - The new spawn chance
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • extremeSpikeBaseIncrease

        IceSpike.Builder extremeSpikeBaseIncrease(int increase)
        Sets the base height increase of the extreme spikes.
        Parameters:
        increase - The new base height increase
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • extremeSpikeIncreaseVariance

        IceSpike.Builder extremeSpikeIncreaseVariance(int variance)
        Sets the variance in the height increase of extreme spikes. The final increase will be the base increase plus a random amount between zero (inclusive) and the variance (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        variance - The new increase variance
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • reset

        IceSpike.Builder reset()
        Resets this builder to the default values.
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • build

        IceSpike build()
        throws IllegalStateException
        Builds a new instance of a IceSpike populator with the settings set within the builder.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the populator
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If there are any settings left unset which do not have default values
